DOC.brief_summary: This study determine whether treatment AMG 162 prevent lumbar spine bone loss early late postmenopausal woman osteopenia , test safety tolerability AMG 162 population .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate AMG 162 Prevention Postmenopausal Osteoporosis
DOC.criteria: Eligibility Criteria Postmenopausal woman Osteopenia ( lumbar spine bone mineral density Tscore 1.0 2.5 )
